Shannen Doherty shared an update on her cancer, saying it has now spread to her brain. 
The actress took to her Instagram to further educate people about cancer treatments and diagnoses. She posted … [+1617 chars]

articles.description: Putri Ariani, who hails from Indonesia, gave a show-stopping performance that triggered waterworks for judges and viewers alike. Even usually stoic Simon Cowell was moved by her act.
articles.content:
